description: A .NET Core Lambda Function for converting Excel sheet column letters to column numbers and vice versa.
usage: Run the Lambda functions locally using `dotnet lambda invoke-function`.
tests: Unit tests are included to ensure the correctness of the conversion methods.
instructions: 1. Run `dotnet build` to build the project.
2. Run `dotnet test` to execute the unit tests.
3. Run Lambda functions locally using `dotnet lambda invoke-function`.
author: Thavapalani
